body: Amphibians       Bandelier's relatively dry environment limits the variety of amphibians to 2 species of salamanders, 2 species of toad, and 3 species of frogs.  Most of these are found in the riparian zones or near high country ponds.        photo by sally king  CANYON TREEFROG        photo by sally king  BULLFROG        photo by sally king   Chorus Frog        photo by chris judson  JEMEZ MOUNTAIN SALAMANDER        photo by sally king   TIGER SALAMANDER        photo by sally king  WOODHOUSE TOAD
title: Bandelier National Monument: Amphibians
